edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.game.blackjack

Class Blackjack

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.game.blackjack.Blackjack

  • public class Blackjack
extends java.lang.Object
    Blackjack Class has the following: Deck, ArrayList (list for players), Player (dealer), and Card (next card to show). This class also contains methods for hitting and staying.
    Version:
    2017.11.28
    Author:
    Brian Wan, Fanny Kuang, Eric Palyan, David Tsu, Marco Chavez, Ryan Kirkpatrick, Ryan Lorica

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int dealerHandValue()
      returns the value of the dealer's hand with aces valued at 1
      boolean dealerHasBlackjack()
      returns true if dealer has blackjack
      Card dealerHit()
      makes the dealer hit and returns a reference to the card he drew so it can be displayed
      boolean dealerNotBust()
      returns false if the dealer busted
      int dealerSecondValue()
      returns the value of the dealer's hand with aces valued at 11 or returns -1 if the value of the dealer's hand with aces valued at 11 makes the value greater than 21
      boolean dealerShouldStay()
      decides whether or not the dealer should stay i.e.
      java.lang.String displayDealerCardValue()
      formats a String to return the value of just the dealer's first card during the player's turn

      returns true if player passed to method has blackjack
